1.title: The Last Day
1.plot: Over the past year, Taylor Stevenson has had to learn to cope with the death of her best friend Sarah who died in a car accident. Ready to move on, dark memories are brought up once again after a girl in her town is found dead. Under the constant harassment of Sarah's sister Rachel, Taylor realizes that situation she is in is much more grave than she once thought.

2.title: Accusations
2.plot: Taylor turns towards Josh and Emily for help after encountering Rachel at a surprising location. Together, the trio teams up to prove that Rachel is framing Taylor but in doing so, find a comprisable piece of evidence.

3.title: Leave a Message After the Beep
3.plot: Keen on figuring out why Taylor left the voicemail on Josh's phone, the trio get together to figure out what really happened the night Stephanie was murdered. A shocking discovery leads Taylor further into despair.

4.title: Unhinged
4.plot: The trio splits up in the penultimate episode of "Evidence Against Me" to put an end to Rachel's sinister plan to frame Taylor for Stephanie's murder. In a twist of events, new information is brought to light, forever changing Taylor.

5.title: See You on the Other Side
5.plot: The final episode of the web series "Evidence Against Me". Turning towards escape, Taylor decides to leave but her plans are halted when new answers and revelations are brought to light. Meanwhile, Josh and Emily search for Taylor in hopes to put the past to rest.

imdb.plot outline: Taylor Campbell has spent the last year coping with the death of her best friend Sarah who was in a terrible car accident. With the help of her therapist, Dr. Parker, and good friends, Emily and Josh, she is finally ready to move on. Completely starting over, everything seems to be going well for Taylor until a girl's body is found nearby, sending Taylor into a downward spiral. As old memories resurface and with the constant harassment of Sarah's sister Rachel, the boundaries of Taylor's mentality is tested.
imdb.title: Evidence Against Me
plot: Taylor Campbell has spent the last year coping with the death of her best friend Sarah who was in a terrible car accident. With the help of her therapist, Dr. Parker, and good friends, Emily and Josh, she is finally ready to move on. Completely starting over, everything seems to be going well for Taylor until a girl's body is found nearby, sending Taylor into a downward spiral. As old memories resurface and with the constant harassment of Sarah's sister Rachel, the boundaries of Taylor's mentality is tested.::Hunter Livingston Films
